member.name: T:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationResult
member.summary: This is the actual results from the validation rule.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationResult.ResultIdentifier
member.summary: This is a unique id for the validation result.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationResult.ValidationRuleReference
member.summary: This refers (foreign key) back up to the validation rule run.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationResult.ValidationRuleRunReference
member.summary: This is a unique id that points back to the validation rule that caused the result to be produced.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationResult.ResourceId
member.summary: This is the unique identifier in the ODS that is used to reference a specific resource. Examples include an Id, StudentUniqueId or EducationOrganizationId.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationResult.ResourceType
member.summary: This is the resource associated with the validation rule. This is denormalized from the validation rule, every instance of a given RuleId will have the same Ed-Fi resource

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationResult.EducationOrganizationReference
member.summary: Along with NameSpace, This is useful for limiting what systems can consume the validation results and routing the validation results within the consuming system.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationResult.StudentReference
member.summary: Reference back to an EdFi student object, when applicable for that validation

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationResult.StaffReference
member.summary: Reference back to an EdFi staff object, when applicable for that validation

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationResult.Namespace
member.summary: Along with EducationOrganization, this can be used for limiting what systems can consume the validation results and routing the validation results within the consuming system.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationResult.AdditionalContext
member.summary: Includes the details that were used in the evaluation of the validation rule.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.AdditionalContext.IdentificationCode
member.summary: Custom data element which provides additional context for the result.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.AdditionalContext.CustomizationValue
member.summary: Additional context for the result.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationResultRequest.ResultIdentifier
member.summary: The unique id for a validation result.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationResultRequest.RunIdentifier
member.summary: The unique Id for the run

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationResultRequest.RuleIdentifier
member.summary: The the unique Id for the validation rule.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationResultRequest.RuleSource
member.summary: The source or origin of the rule.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationResultRequest.EducationOrganizationId
member.summary: The EducationOrganizationId for the organization the validation result is for.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationResultRequest.StudentUniqueId
member.summary: The StudentUniqueId for the student the validation result is related to.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationResultRequest.StaffUniqueId
member.summary: The StaffUniqueId for the staff the validation result is related to.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationResultRequest.Namespace
member.summary: The Namespace the validation result is for.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationResultRequest.ResourceId
member.summary: The unique identifier in the ODS that is used to reference a specific resource.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationResultRequest.ResourceType
member.summary: The resource associated with the validation rule.

member.name: T:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRule
member.summary: Logic which identifies errors within the data or which require further investigation.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRule.RuleIdentifier
member.summary: This is the unique Id for a validation rule.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRule.RuleSource
member.summary: The source or origin of the rule.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRule.HelpUrl
member.summary: A link to more information about the rule and how to resolve it.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRule.ShortDescription
member.summary: This is non-structured ASCII text that will include the short details that were used in the evaluation of the validation rule.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRule.Description
member.summary: This is non-structured ASCII text that will include the details that were used in the evaluation of the validation rule.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRule.RuleStatusDescriptor
member.summary: The current status of if the rule. Examples are 'Active', 'Under Analysis', 'Inactive', 'Deprecated'.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRule.Category
member.summary: This is a category for the type of validation rule. Examples might be 'Student Demographics', 'Special Education', or 'Attendance'

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRule.SeverityDescriptor
member.summary: This specifies whether the validation rule is a 'Warning', 'Minor Validation Error', 'Major Validation Error' or other value standardized by the API

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRule.ExternalRuleId
member.summary: Refers back to a unique identifier for this rule in another system (such as a state-maintained repository of validation rules)

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRule.ValidationLogicTypeDescriptor
member.summary: Specifies the language that the validation logic is represented in, ie SQL or Pseudo-code

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRule.ValidationLogic
member.summary: Has the actual code or pseudo-code that is used to find validation errors.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRuleReference.RuleIdentifier
member.summary: The unique Id for a validation rule.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRuleReference.RuleSource
member.summary: The source or origin of the rule.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRuleRequest.RuleIdentifier
member.summary: The unique Id for a validation rule.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRuleRequest.RuleSource
member.summary: The source or origin of the rule.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRuleRequest.RuleStatus
member.summary: The current status of if the rule. Examples are 'Active', 'Under Analysis', 'Inactive', 'Deprecated'.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRuleRequest.Category
member.summary: A category for the type of validation rule. Examples might be 'Student Demographics', 'Special Education', or 'Attendance'

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRuleRequest.SeverityDescriptor
member.summary: Whether the validation rule is a 'Warning', 'Minor Validation Error', 'Major Validation Error' or other value standardized by the API

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRuleRequest.ExternalRuleId
member.summary: Refers back to a unique identifier for this rule in another system (such as a state-maintained repository of validation rules)

member.name: T:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRuleRun
member.summary: This element will track the runs of the validation rules.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRuleRun.RunIdentifier
member.summary: This is a unique Id for each run

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRuleRun.RunStartDateTime
member.summary: This is time that the validation run was started.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRuleRun.RunFinishDateTime
member.summary: This is the time the validation run finished.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRuleRun.RunStatusDescriptor
member.summary: This will denote the status of the validation run. Possible values include 'Running','Finished','Stopped-manual','Stopped-Error'

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRuleRun.Host
member.summary: The name of the Host or ODS that was evaluated in this run

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRuleRun.ValidationEngine
member.summary: A reference to the validation engine that was responsible for this run

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRuleRun.EducationOrganizationReference
member.summary: Organization for which the run was executed.

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRuleRunReference.RunIdentifier
member.summary: This is a unique Id for each run

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRuleRunRequest.RunIdentifier
member.summary: The unique Id for a run

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRuleRunRequest.Host
member.summary: The name of the Host or ODS that was evaluated in a run

member.name: P:Wi.Dpi.Validations.Models.ValidationRuleRunRequest.ValidationEngine
member.summary: A reference to the validation engine that was responsible for this run
